Uses of Class
org.springframework.web.reactive.BindingContext

  • Packages that use BindingContext 
    Package Description
    org.springframework.web.reactive
    Top-level package for the spring-webflux module that contains DispatcherHandler, the main entry point for WebFlux server endpoint processing including key contracts used to map requests to handlers, invoke them, and process the result.
    org.springframework.web.reactive.result.method
    Infrastructure for handler method processing.
    org.springframework.web.reactive.result.method.annotation
    Infrastructure for annotation-based handler method processing.

    • Uses of BindingContext in org.springframework.web.reactive

      Methods in org.springframework.web.reactive that return BindingContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BindingContext HandlerResult.getBindingContext()
      Return the BindingContext used for request handling.

      Constructor and Description
      HandlerResult(java.lang.Object handler, java.lang.Object returnValue, org.springframework.core.MethodParameter returnType, BindingContext context)
      Create a new HandlerResult.
